programme.title: NFL Today: Browns @ Ravens LIVE
programme.desc: AFC North divisional matchup as the Cleveland Browns visit the Baltimore Ravens. Two teams with strong defenses and running games clash in what promises to be a physical, hard-fought battle. Watch as Lamar Jackson leads the Ravens offense against Cleveland's formidable defense.

programme.title: NFL Today: Seahawks @ Steelers LIVE
programme.desc: Cross-conference clash as the Seattle Seahawks travel to Pittsburgh to face the Steelers. Two storied franchises meet with the Seahawks' explosive passing attack going up against Pittsburgh's legendary Steel Curtain defense. Expect a high-energy game at Heinz Field.

programme.title: NFL Today: Bills @ Jets LIVE
programme.desc: AFC East rivalry heats up as the Buffalo Bills visit the New York Jets. Division rivals clash with playoff implications on the line. The Bills' high-powered offense led by Josh Allen faces off against the Jets' improving defense in this crucial divisional matchup.
